mods.name: Portal Expansion Mod
mods.description:
Adds additional portal equipment and new content based around portals. Currently on an early test version, so please give feedback. More is planned to be added.

Changelog:
0.0.1: Fixed crash when attempting to 'lose' the improved portal panties, fixed portal rings so they should now stack when taken off. Fixed crash when retrieving portals. Added a couple more scenes.

0.0.2: Fixed softlock when attempting certain actions.

0.0.3: Fixed crashes when attempting rollback. Fixed portal ring variations being obtainable when not intended. Added some messages when attaching portal rings. Added differing effects when multiple linked rings are attached. Fixed incorrectly triggering sleeping and shower scenes when no portal items were equipped.

0.0.4: Added conditions to various buttons so that you should no longer be able to view scenes for bodyparts that you don't have.

0.0.5: Fixed portal panties so they should now show random scenes correctly.

0.0.6: Fixed some scenes not working correctly.

0.1.0: Fixed crash when attempting to access vendomat (again), added more scenes.

0.1.1: Fixed crash when attempting to attach portal rings.

0.1.2: Fixed crash when attempting to attach portal rings (again).

-All 4 weapons can only be obtained through the debug menu since I have no idea how to add them to enemy loot.
-There is a non-zero chance that I fucked up when making the .zip archive.

-Lore: One morning, you find a small device in the engineering section of the station, with a small screen, a keyboard and a standard memory connector, with the letters "BRA" stenciled on the back.
Right now it seems empty of programmed modules, but looking a bit in the pile of junk, you find a memory stick with "CaninePussy" written on it, and after plugging it and fiddling a bit with the controls, you notice that your fellow Canine prisoners suddenly all have animalistic pussies instead of humanoid ones. Surprisingly, noone seems to notice the difference but you...
Are... are you able to alter reality with this device? You must find other modules, stat!

-Description: This is what I managed to hack together to make in-game options for mods possible, since having multiple versions of the same mod for different options is fucking annoying for the modders and for the users, and it's basically impossible to add custom options to the base game Options without releasing a custom build.
Alone, this mod does nothing, but with mods using compatible scene files, more options are going to get added dynamically, for the users they just need to have this mod and the (future) compatible mods will add themselves to the options available (check the pictures for an example with the Canine Pussy mod).
Right now only text boxes and scene buttons can be used to change mods, as I still haven't managed to include checkboxes and dropdown lists, but perhaps I'll manage one day.

For modders, check all the files in the following Canine Pussy mod to understand how to make one for your mod, I added comments to help you, and I will happily answer questions, it's both not hard and a bit finicky...
What's important is using flags in your module.gd and you MUST have a [YourMod]/Scenes/ModsOptionsScenes folder with the scene inside for it to register. You don't have to name the scene as I did, but it will help with what shows in game.

[url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Alexofp/BDCCMods/main/previews/ModsOptions.png]Click for Preview[/url]

mods.name: Equine Pussy

This adds the Equine Pussy in the vagina parts available. There's no actual visible parts, but the descriptions are different, and it naturally handles bigger volumes and is easier to fit things in.
If you find any bug of course notify me, and I'm listening to suggestions.

This version have both normal and Hypertus-compatible parts, in addition to the new support for the BRA (Mods Options), meaning there is no need for more than one version of the mod if you want NPCs to have equine pussies, just change the percentage with the BRA, it even works with Hypertus for NPCs.

[b]Delete all the old versions of the mod[/b], since now you can use the BRA to edit the percentage of Equine NPCs having equine pussies, by default it's 0% and it you don't use the BRA you can't easily change that proportion, but it's not necessary for this mod to work.
Technically you could change the flags manually, the important part is RealValue (EquinePercent is basically just to make it more readable for people), if you make RealValue "1" the percentage of Equine NPCs having an equine pussy is 50%, "0.333" is 25%, "4" is 75%, and a billion is ~100%

mods.name: Nano Revolution
mods.description:
CONTENT WARNING: This mod has some force transformation content. This will warn you when it is about to happen.
So this mod is inspired by one of the in-game scenes, where you check the unfinished nano android program, and Sentinel-X, the prototype trying to transform you into the nano android. Unfortunately, this program was stopped by Captain, and Sentinel-X lost its power before full transformation.
Now, let's imagine what if Alex persuaded Captain to continue that program. Introducing Nano Revolution Mod, this mod realizes the nano android program.

Current Features:
-A new semi-playable specie, nano android. Usually, these androids are perfect guards, following every command and easy to manage. 
(You cannot choose this race in the start of the game, but maybe something terrible (or exciting for some people) could happen when entering a certain room in the engineering bay.)
-A new dynamic npc type, the nano android. Will frisk you and force tougher punishment if you keep refusing their request. Be careful
-A semi completed new skill tree that is closely related to confronting these nano guards.

Future plan (rank by priority):
Fully developed nano engineering skill tree. You can make something really powerful with this skill.
More nano android type. nano engineers, nurses, and even android sextoys, enrich the BDCC life.
Mature nano species side path. A new skill tree that is closely related to how to use your new body.
Since Alex is in charge of this program, more story line and interaction with Alex when you accidentally turn into nano android.

Have fun with these nano androids~ If you have any suggestions, bug reports, typo reports, and even story suggestions, feel free to send me these messages. They will be very helpful for my future development. XD

v0.4.1 update:
- Fix the issue where the topic about nano androids discussed by Alex cannot be triggered correctly. (I made a really silly mistake while playing with the interaction system, and that caused this to happen. )
- The end of the tough punishment scene will now take you to the new stock interaction system instead of the old, unused stock punishment scene..
